H0.text: What river flows through the Grand Canyon in the USA. Missouri

H1.text: What river flows through the Grand Canyon in the USA. Rio Grande

H2.text: What river flows through the Grand Canyon in the USA. Arkansas

H3.text: What river flows through the Grand Canyon in the USA. Colo.

A4.text: The Colorado River flows through the Grand Canyon.

A5.text: The Missouri River does not flow through the Grand Canyon.
